node.text: If the young readers in your life are taking part in #HarryPotterReadingMagic we have this great 'Marble House Point Jars' DIY. Take part in weekly chapter challenges and earn house points. See how many they can earn as we explore the first book. Head to the link in our bio to find this week's chapter challenge

node.title: Wizarding World | Marble House Point Jars

node.text:
Each week for #HarryPotterReadingMagic we'll be listening to some of the extracts from the first book read by Stephen Fry. For week one we've chosen this conversation between Dumbledore and McGonagall. 

Until July 31st, listen to Harry Potter and the Philosopher's/Sorcerer's Stone for free with Alexa, just say 'Alexa, read Harry Potter Book One'

node.title: Harry Potter Reading Magic | Week One

node.text:
See singer-songwriter and lifelong Harry Potter fan @LiamPayne launch the Deck the Great Hall experience with his own special message. Head to the link in our bio to send your message to a loved one this Christmas. 

#WizardingWorldChristmas

node.text: Hermione might not have rated Professor Trelawney, but she *did* get some very important things right!  Head to the link in our bio as we take a look at when her Inner Eye saw the truth.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 29, 2021. May be an image of 4 people, people standing and text.

node.text: As we ventured in the 1920s with the Fantastic Beasts films, we were introduced to a host of new characters – magical and Muggle (or should we say No-Maj) alike! Who would be your Fantastic Beasts best buddy? Head to the link in our bio to find out

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 28, 2021. May be an image of 3 people, people sitting and indoor.

node.text: We *know* you know the differences between the books and the films, but will you make the cut with our quiz based on all eight movies? Lights, camera, action, let us know your score by heading to the link in our bio 🎬

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 27, 2021. May be an image of 3 people, eyeglasses, indoor and text.

node.text: As the seventh month draws to an end, we take a look at the eerie similarities between the Chosen One and the almost chosen one... Head to the link in our bio to read now

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 27, 2021. May be an anime-style image of 2 people.

node.text: One of our favourite parts of the fandom is passing on the stories to the next generation of readers. If you know new readers we want to know what their favourite moment of bravery is from the first book!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 26, 2021. May be an image of 2 people and outdoors.

node.text: Hogwarts loves a good holiday and tends to go all out when one rolls around. What seasonal event would you most look forward to? (We're inclined to say Hallowe'en for the spooky/cosy vibes!)

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 25, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and beard.

node.text: Dumbledore is arguably one of the series' most complex characters. We see various accounts of him throughout Fantastic Beasts, Harry Potter and Cursed Child. Has your opinion of him changed throughout the different stories?

node.text: It's the final week of #HarryPotterReadingMagic join us as we read chapters 14-17 and explore the theme 'Facing Fears with Friends'. Head to the link in our bio to find the themed activities

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 24, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, motorcycle and outdoors.

node.text: As Harry leaves Privet Drive for the final time, he is accompanied by Hagrid and his modified motorcycle. Daniel Radcliffe said riding in the sidecar was some of the most fun he ever had on set and that it would "be a great way to come to work in the mornings, although probably very dangerous"

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 23, 2021. May be an image of 2 people and text.

node.text: McGonagall once asked, "Why is it, when something happens, it is always you three?" - and she has a point! If you attended Hogwarts, would you have wanted to be friends with the trio or would you have preferred to be far from the drama of the Chosen One?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 21, 2021. May be an image of 3 people, people standing and indoor.

node.text: Which friendship of the wizarding world do you think is the purest? Head to the link in our bio as we take a look at the duos and groups we envy the most!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Wizarding World on July 21, 2021.
